description:
The Kito family has been offering sacrifices to the Mongolian Death Worm for 200 years, and Jiji’s house is built on top of the sacrificial altar. Momo and Okarun, controlled by the psychic waves, try to commit suicide, but Jiji attempts to carry them to safety. However, the Mongolian Death Worm looms before them. Just when it looks like everything is done for, the Evil Eye shows himself...
Source: Crunchyroll
